attributes.action: Increase the prison sentence for rape
attributes.additional_details: Parliament has the option to create a Law that increases the prison sentence for rape
attributes.background: Increase the prison sentence for people who are raped

rejection.details:
You may like to sign the following petition we currently have open on the issue:

Mandatory 50 year sentence for child sex abuse, rape, murder, terrorism & kidnap
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/579966
